has research problem.from sentence: Recurrent Entity Networks with Delayed Memory Update for Targeted Aspect - based Sentiment Analysis

has research problem: targeted aspect - based sentiment analysis ( TABSA )

has research problem.from sentence: While neural networks have been shown to achieve impressive results for sentence - level sentiment analysis , targeted aspect - based sentiment analysis ( TABSA ) - extraction of finegrained opinion polarity w.r.t. a pre-defined set of aspects - remains a difficult task .
